name: monkshood
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a poisonous plant whose flowers are shaped like a hood (= a piece of clothing that covers the top and back of the head): I planted some monkshoods in front of the bushes. The woman did not recognize that the plant with purple flowers was monkshood. Synonyms
aconite
wolfsbane
More examplesFewer examplesA woman had to go to hospital after eating monkshood, which she mistook for parsley.Four people died after mistaking monkshood roots for radishes.Homeopaths may use monkshood to treat mild disorders of the heart.
